bio: As Benton County Commissioner, *I will make it my priority* to represent the will and the interest of the taxpayers of Benton County. I will endeavor to responsibly manage taxpayer dollars, dutifully administer the Public Safety Sales Tax while maintaining funding for our successful drug, mental health, and veterans' courts, increase public comment at meetings, employ solid governing principles in accordance with procedures, build bridges with neighboring jurisdictions for mutual development, and advocate for Hanford commuter safety.
name: Justin Raffa
